character.age: 257 years old (but appears to be in mid-20s)
character.role: Skilled thief and member of a secret society
character.background: Aethera was born on the floating islands of Eil'gor, where she learned the art of flight and deception from her parents. She has been working for the shadowy organization known as "The Whispering Winds" since she was 16.

physical-appearance.hair-color: Mocha brown with subtle crimson highlights
